subject: RE: [junit] Problems with Test Infected.
msgSnippet: May have found my trouble. Would I be right to say that the bit of code which goes: TestCase test = new MoneyTest( simple add ) { public void runTest() {
messageBody:
May have found my trouble.

Would I be right to say that the bit of code which goes:

TestCase test = new MoneyTest("simple add")
{
public void runTest()
{
testSimpleAdd();
}
}

should be in the main() method??? (it does not mention this in the docs)

If so how does it know to run my other test the testEquals one?

Thanks again,
Andoni.
